title: Vianney Accart - Full Stack Developer & Software Engineer

about.title: Full Stack Developer & Software Engineer
about.introduction: I chose the development world because it allows me to develop my curiosity, learning capacity, and creativity on a daily basis. I enjoy creating applications with modern design, high performance, and user-friendliness. My experience enables me to integrate into projects of all types, ranging from a simple showcase website to a complex industrial project. I currently hold the position of software engineer at Prosol (Grand Frais).

skills.title: My survival kit
skills.introduction: These are the languages, frameworks, libraries, and tools that I regularly use.

projects.title: My achievements
projects.introduction: I offer you a selection of some projects I have worked on.

guillaumeAstrucPhotography.description: Online photography sales platform for Guillaume Astruc Photography
guillaumeAstrucPhotography.imageAlt: Illustration of Guillaume Astruc Photography website

chopTonJob.description: Chop'Ton Job allows you to search for companies with recruitment needs

rockQuest.description: Rock'Quest is a Guitar Hero-like game created in Vanilla JS. Playable mainly on desktop

espritBody.description: Showcase website presenting the services of the Esprit Body fitness coaching company

pruneManciet.description: Showcase website presenting the services of Prune Manciet, an osteopath in Bourgoin-Jallieu

enbasdemarue.description: Blog presenting the services offered by the Enbasdemarue marketplace

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.introduction: They trusted me by entrusting me with the realization of their project.

guillaumeAstrucPhotography.testimonial: I am a professional photographer and I called upon Vianney to design my website. He demonstrated great professionalism in adapting to my needs and proposing something that suits me perfectly. He is very organized, available, and proactive

espritBody.testimonial: I approached Vianney when I launched my fitness coaching business to create my website. I had very few ideas regarding the design. Vianney asked me the right questions to offer me different possibilities. He took initiatives to save me time.

contact.title: What if we collaborate ?
contact.introduction: I will accompany you in your project, from planning to implementation. Let's discuss it together.
